items.value: (%@general%) joins the campaign and moves towards the rally point.
On (*_his/her_-0-*) way to the city, (%@general%) meets an enemy army and survives with (%hp%) HP.
On (*_his/her_-0-*) way to the city, (%@general%) meets an enemy army and died.
Everyone is at the rally point. The entire army starts their approach towards (%@city%).
The army arrived at (%@city%) and won the battle with (%hp%) HP remaining. They defeated (%@city%) for (%@kingdom%).
